### Improved

## [1.2.0] - 2023-10-17

### Added
- Dynamic favicon that updates every minute to display time.
- URL container to display saved URLs on the new tab.
- Extended options in `manifest.json` including options page, background script, and required permissions.
- Various styling updates for better UX including hover effects.
- Enhanced the clock to display colors (red, yellow, green) at appropriate time for a fun touch.

### Fixed
- Resolved z-index and background color issues for better visibility and customization.

# New Tab Clock

New Tab Clock: Your Ultimate Dashboard for Time, Date, and Quick-Access URLs
Why New Tab Clock?
Tired of the standard new tab screen offering little utility? New Tab Clock supercharges your new tab page into a dynamic dashboard. Now, not only can you keep track of time and date, but you can also quickly access your favorite URLs and even watch the time tick by on your favicon!

What's New in New Tab Clock?
Upon installing and opening a new tab, you'll experience:

Dynamic Favicon: Your favicon now displays the current time and updates every minute.
Quick-Access URLs: A new section for your most visited URLs, fully customizable.
Enhanced Customization: Modify background color, font, and even hover effects right from the options page.

Minimalistic Design: Focus on what's essentialâ€”time, date, and quick links.
Adaptive Font Sizing: Text scales with your window size for optimum visibility.
High Contrast: Easily readable text in any lighting condition.
No Intrusive Permissions: Your privacy remains intact; only local storage is used.
Who Should Install New Tab Clock?
Professionals: Manage time effectively while multitasking across browser tabs.
Students: Stay focused on your studies with minimal distractions.
Minimalists: Experience a clean, clutter-free UI.
Everyone Else: Isn't knowing the time and date universally useful?
How to Install
Click on the "Add to Chrome" button.
Confirm the installation prompt.
Open a new tab to see New Tab Clock in action!
FAQ
Is it free?
Absolutely, no hidden costs.

Can I customize it?
Yes, from fonts and colors to URLs, you can make it your own.

100% functional without an internet connection.

Conclusion
New Tab Clock is more than just a clock; it's a step toward a focused and productive browsing experience. With new features like dynamic favicon and customizable URLs, it's the best version yet. Install now and elevate your browsing today!
